_header: That was well seen when Saint Thomas
Note: For the full text of the Homily containing this story see 4631.
_description: The Dream of the Mother of St. Thomas: Narratio from the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
It was well seyn qwen sant ThomasOf Canterbere bor
                    was…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…Ihesu bryng tyll vs þis wynþat we may ren in
                    þat bys þat neuer sall end
